application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Olive (Olea europaea) Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2m to shape and tidy. Final height 5m. Final spread 4m.T2 - Crab Apple (Malus sylvestris) Fell and grub out stump T3 - Fig tree (Ficus carica) Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 1-2m to shape and tidy. Final height 3m. Final spread 3mT4 - Olive (Olea europaea) Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2m to shape and tidy. Final height 5m. Final spread 4mT5 - Apple (Malus domestica)	Reduce by 0.5-1m back to most previous reduction points. Final height 5m. Final spread 3mT6 - Weeping Birch (Betula pendula tristis)	Thin crown by 10-15% to allow light to lawn. Final height and spread unchanged at 4mT7 - Cherry (Prunus spp) Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2m. Final height 6m, Final spread 5m.
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
Works agreed to tree labelled T7
Works agreed to tree labelled T5
Works agreed to tree labelled T6
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
